name: explode and scale
desc: The Explode and Scale module is used to separate (or explode) and apply a scaling factor to the vertical dimension (z-coordinate) of cell sets in a model.

properties.name: Vertical Offset
properties.desc: Vertical Offset translates your entire model in Z by the value input multiplied by the Z Exaggeration.  This is useful if you want to move your model to avoid having coincident objects.

properties.name: Explode By
properties.desc: The Explode By options determine what information is used to explode the layers or materials. Layer and Material are nodal data components that should be present with any hierarchical geologic model. The Cell Set option allows you to explode by the Cell Set number. The Lithology option is to be used only with Adaptive Indicator Kriged geologic models.  These models have a cell data component called Lithology which corresponds to integer values assigned to material regions.

properties.name: Explode Begins
properties.desc: Explode Begins determines the first layer or material that will be exploded.

properties.name: Explode Ends
properties.desc: Explode Ends sets the last layer/material which will be exploded.  This value defaults to -1 which will explode all remaining layers or materials.

properties.name: Cell Sets
properties.desc: The Cell Sets control allows selected cell sets to be turned off in the output.
